Tim Frazier shoots during mens basketball media day PERIOD

Advertisement

Four starters are gone PERIOD And with them goes  percent of last years points  percent of last years rebounds and the Nittany Lions alltime leading scorer Talor Battle PERIOD

But one starter for the Penn State mens basketball team remains  Tim Frazier PERIOD

Without Battle Jeff Brooks D.J PERIOD Jackson and Andrew Jones Frazier is now in the spotlight and he said he feels ready to play a bigger role as a scorer and as a leader PERIOD

Now a junior Frazier averaged . points . minutes and led the team with . assists per game one season ago PERIOD Frazier who is one of the teams three captains along with senior Cammeron Woodyard and redshirt junior Billy Oliver said there is going to be more weight on his shoulders this season PERIOD

Many new faces are surrounding the 6foot1 guard this season including coach Patrick Chambers PERIOD

Im going to get a lot of attention that I didnt get last year with those four great seniors that we had on the court Frazier said PERIOD Ive just been adjusting as far as with a new coach in Coach Chambers just helping me in taking a leadership role taking me daybyday helping me become a better leader than I was last year PERIOD On the court Ive just been working hard and going all out every day.I dont want to put it all on Tim Frazier PERIOD I dont think thats fair for a junior PERIOD Its Tim Frazier Cam Woodyard and Billy Oliver PERIOD They are our three captains PERIOD They are our three leadersThey need to come out with the attitude leadership never takes a day off PERIOD These younger guys are always looking to these guys to lead the way. if youre interested in submitting a Letter to the Editor click here PERIOD

Were always interested in hearing about news in our community PERIOD Let us know whats going on
